titleStmt.title: An epitome of the vvorlds woe vvherein is perspicuously discouered, the lamentable miseries of the world, in these tempestuous times, the infidelitie of fained friends, and ficklenesse of deceitefull fortune : continued by way of meditation and resolution / by Geo. Dichante, gent.
titleStmt.author: Dichante, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Cotes, and Richard Cotes,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The woe of the world.
Imprint date (cropped) suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
